text: Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil is a game-changer for anyone seeking healthier, shinier, and stronger hair. Packed with nutrient-rich, biotin-infused ingredients, this treatment nourishes and strengthens hair from root to tip, leaving behind a refreshing, invigorating scent.One of its standout features is its ability to smooth split ends, providing a sleek and polished look. Additionally, it soothes dry scalp and combats dandruff, thanks to its rich blend of over 30 essential oils and nutrients.What sets this product apart is its versatility—it's suitable for all hair types, including chemically-treated, braided, and weaved hair.As a woman who values natural beauty and effective results, I am impressed by Mielle Organics' commitment to using gentle, organic ingredients. Overall, this product has become an essential part of my hair care routine, leaving me with luscious, radiant hair that I love.
title: Good stuff
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

text: To me, this oil feels kind of slimy (which isn't a bad thing in my opinion), but I feel it works great. I'm not sure if it promotes growth but it definitely helps my hair feel more hydrated! Has a minty scent. I would highly recommend!
title: Great
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: I was losing clumps of hair so randomly back in October or November. So i started using this oil every other day for about a month now and I'm seeing a LOT OF IMPROVEMENT with my hair fall. It has greatly reduced my hair fall, it went from 100+ strands to ~25 strands in the shower. I found that if you deep oil and wear a satin or silk cap and then sleep overnight with it then you lose less than 10 strands. But consistency is key. The quality of my hair is getting better too. I see very few baby hairs growing at the moment, i think I'll have more after 2 to 3 months. My hair length hasn't really changed much tho. But I'm liking it so far.
title: It helped me a lot
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: I bought this product to help with genetic hair loss. I have only been using it for 2 weeks, and I believe I'm noticing the baby hairs at the top of my head are a bit longer and more pronounced now. Other than that, it's a little hard for me to tell if my bald spots (mostly at my parietal ridge) are really growing back in. However, this oil has provided another benefit I didn't expect: it's restored my natural curl pattern. I oil my hair, massage it in, and let it "marinate" for a couple hours every wash day (every 2/3 days), and I've noticed my hair air dries SO wavy now, with almost no tangles. As someone who has struggled to preserve and take care of my wavy hair, this was a lifesaver. My hair looks properly curly and voluminous now (as opposed to stringy and frizzy before), such that my bald spots are MUCH less noticeable. Additionally, the coarseness of my hair has improved a LOT - my hair hasn't been so soft and shiny since I was a kid. Regardless of whether it causes regrowth, this oil has improved my hair's appearance and texture so much that it was 100% worth the buy.
title: Restored curl pattern, softened hair
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

text: But I'm sticking with it.
title: Itches my scalp
location_and_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
